General.Name: Guizhou Aviation Technical Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Guizhou Aviation Technical Development Co., Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells aviation military ring forgings. The company also develops aerospace ring forgings. Its products used in aviation, ship, high-speed rail, nuclear power, aerospace, and construction machinery applications. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Guiyang, China.

3.Name: Mr. Yun  Zeng
3.Title: Board Sec. and Deputy Gen. Mang.
